kind.description: Describes the type of resource. e.g. ingress, application, mysql etc. If not specified, fallback is the `folder_name`/instances

flavor.description: Implementation selector for the resource. e.g. for a resource type ingress, default, aws_alb, gcp_alb etc.

version.description: This field can be used to pin to a particular version

lifecycle.description: This field describes the phase in which the resource has to be invoked (`ENVIRONMENT_BOOTSTRAP`)

conditional_on_intent.description: Flag to enable the resource based on intent availability. eg mysql if mysql dashboard is required to be deployed. Note: Need to have the instance running beforehand to avail.

provided.description: Flag to tell if the resource should not be provisioned by facets

depends_on.description: Dependencies on other resources. e.g. application x may depend on mysql

name.description:
Name of the resource
    - if not specified, fallback is the `filename`

spec.description: Specification as per resource types schema

out.description: Output given by the resource for others to refer.

advanced.description: Additional fields if any for a particular implementation of a resource

max_connections.description: The maximum permitted number of simultaneous client connections.

reader.description: The maximum permitted number of simultaneous client connections for the reader

writer.description: The maximum permitted number of simultaneous client connections for the writer

size.description: Map containing necessary information for Reader and Writer. For aurora postgres sql, volume is not needed for reader and writer but required for cloudsql.

cpu.description: The number of CPU cores required, e.g '1' or '1000m'

memory.description: The amount of memory required, e.g '800Mi' or '1.5Gi'

cpu_limit.description: The CPU limit to set a maximum limit on the amount of CPU resources utilization, e.g '1' or '1000m'

memory_limit.description: The memory limit to set a maximum limit on the amount of memory resources utilization, e.g '800Mi' or '1.5Gi'

instance.description: The instance type of the node. e.g 't2.micro', 'Standard_DS1_v2', 'n1-standard-2', 'db.m5.large', 'db-n1-standard-1' or 'db-f1-micro'

volume.description: The size of the volume. e.g '10G' or '5Gi'

instance_count.description: The number of instances to create.

replica_count.description: [Deprecated] The number of instances to create.

interfaces.description: Map of reader and writer endpoints generated by the module

db_names.description: a list of additional databases created
a list of additional databases created

excludedDatabases.description: List of databases to be excluded for prometheus-postgres-exporter

defaultDatabase.description: Default database for the connection string of prometheus-postgres-exporter

kind.description: Describes the type of resource. e.g. cloudsql or aurora

flavor.description: Implementation selector for the Postgres resource. e.g. for a resource type cloudsql or aurora.

version.description: This field can be used to pin to a particular version

provided.description: Flag to tell if the resource should not be provisioned by facets

depends_on.description: Dependencies on other resources. e.g. application x may depend on y

name.description:
Name of the resource
    - if not specified, fallback is the `filename`

advanced.description: Advanced values to be used by different flavours of postgres between Cloudsql or Aurora

anyOf.description: Advanced Values for AWS RDS Aurora

rds-aurora.description: Resource values as per the module documentation https://registry.terraform.io/modules/terraform-aws-modules/rds-aurora/aws/7.3.0#inputs

aws_db_parameter_group.description: Resource values as per the terraform resource documentation https://registry.terraform.io/providers/hashicorp/aws/latest/docs/resources/db_parameter_group

anyOf.description: Advanced values for Cloud SQL Postgres
Advanced values for AWS RDS Postgres

rds-postgres.description: Resource values as per the module documentation https://registry.terraform.io/modules/terraform-aws-modules/rds/aws/6.7.0#inputs

reader.description: The map of parameters that needs to be added on reader instances.

writer.description: The map of parameters that needs to be added on writer instances.
